p: LM and YX conceived and designed the study. BQ was responsible for patientsâ€™ samples collection. QH and JL helped to conduct some experiments including IHC staining. LM and XH performed the data analyses. XBZ and BW validated the results. LM drafted the manuscript with YW. YX, ZY and XZ reviewed and revised the manuscript. ZY guided the article revision and the selection of statistical methods. All authors contributed to the article and approved the submitted version.
